reviews.review:
Gameplay

    Dead by daylight is multiplayer asymmetric survival horror games one versus four online multiplayer, you can play as a killer or a survivor. As a killer you need to sacrifice a survivor by hooking the to meat hook (which is weird...) or you can kill them by using a perk that is unique for some killer or by an offering called mori. Survivor need to escape a trial by fixing the 5 generator the open the exit gate and escape or using a hatch ( hatch will respawn depend on fixed generator and survivor left in the trial).


Match Started

    Right now there 24 survivor and 24 killer some of killer or survivor are from other franchises like halloween, left 4 dead, stranger things, scream, texas chainsaw massacare, saw, evil dead, a nightmare on elm street, and silent hill  Each killer and survivor has their own unique perk which can help them to for their objective, well sometimes some killer or survivor perk are useless. Some perk will have synergy with other perk there's many option to combine them. Killer have their own unique power which can help in the trial, some killer will have and easy power for you to mastering that skill, but some killer have a hard power for you to master it. 


Perk Example

    The trial start in a realms there 15 realms each has a various enviroment and  based on a killer. Survivor and killer will spawn randomly in the realm. Survivor are in the third person and the killer in first person. This make survivor more aware of their current area and a killer will makes more difficult to chase survivor because limited visualibility. Survivor can bring item to trial ther medkit, toolbox, map and a key Different item will unlock interaction which can help you in trial. Item can also have add on, this add on will improve usefullness of that item. Killer can also have an add on for their power it can improve a killer unique power.

Plot

    Basically entity an unkown evil force abduct some people it can be a killer a survivor and they must play trial endlessly to satisfy the entity which death is no an escape, the entitiy block the gateway of death so they can back to entity world again. They are dissapearing from the world without a trace. Each Survivor and killer has their own background story.

Audio

    Audio of this game is great, map have their own unique ambience sound. You can hear a footstep when walking or survivor breathing when you near them. Some survivor have their own unique chasing sound when chasing survivor. When a killer near survivor it's will give a heartbeat sound which make you feel on terror is the killer is going to you or not.

Graphic

    Graphic was great but not somewhat very eye catching scenery or whatever its using unreal engine 4 And using preset to change the graphic low-ultra. When you put graphic to ultra sometimes it make some map more darker which make killer more harder to locate survivor, well you can exploit it by using low setting and if you a survivor in ultra setting sometimes can be a cons because you think that spot is good hiding place but the killer in low mode and can see you there.

Conclusion

    Dead by daylight for me is something new and fresh gameplay it worked for me because i really like horror games, its not that very repetitive because you will be facing a different killer or survivor with different playstyles. Each player has their own strategy to playing this games. Overall i really recomend this games. It may be hard when you first time play it, but after you familiarize with it you will get into it. Maybe you try the mobile version of this games its free although its not fully describe the pc version. Dead by daylight avaible in steam and console (PS4, XB 1 and Switch)

Thank you for reading!!!!

I thought I have to write this now after those 700 hours of playtime.
I think the game is ok but still there are lots of things I really dont like about it although I think it has lots of potential that wont be used I think.
First:
This game is fun with friends and it has a very good progression system to let the players play more and more.

-This brings me to the point, that this system needs waaay too long! After some games u will only play because u can get more perks and stuff in the hope it will be more intense when u get more. It wont get more intense tho.
-Another thing I hate is that the devs of the game dont even know their game really. They just put out a new Killer and a new Survivor every 3 months but wont change those things that make the gameplay shitty! 
                                                  -shitty servers,
                                                  -Endgame
                                                  -overpowered Items or offerings like keys or morys (insta escape for surv or insta kill for 
                                                                                                                                                                                        killer)
                                                  -There are only 10 perks or so that are geally used by the most survs so everything else is 
                                                   just useless
                                                  -there are Items that are not used by anyone which makes them useless as well

And because mostly the same perks are used my the most people, the same items (and there arent a lot), the matches are mostly the same. The only thing that kept me playin was the hope for more intense gameplay when I have a bigger variety of perks but it isnt.
In its state now, where the Devs just keep pushing out more chapers, I will not recommend this game. There will only be a variety of gameplay if u spend 6$ or so every 3 Months or play extremely long to at least get some unlicensed killers and survivors.

追逐很好玩。就是有点难度，再加上容易乱封号，出bug就封，网络不佳就封，玩着玩着莫名其妙就封了，游戏本体加DLC加皮肤都报废，别买，浪费钱。
游戏的卡顿，穿模以及种种bug，杂草过于粗糙，场景光效都不太好，非常黑。
你要申诉得去官网各种卡加英文，然后邮件，各种什么看不懂你发的邮件什么意思，什么不明白你说什么，装傻充愣。
然后就是匹配不到人，好久匹配到的都是高手，不会给你同段位的，体验感极差。
画面感特别黑，非常伤眼睛，不带耳机声音各种乱叫惨叫呻吟，又听不清脚步声，带耳机静静地听又会时不时会爆特别大声的爆炸，耳朵当场爆炸，比如正常声音5，乱叫惨叫10，爆炸声100，耳朵一下炸傻。
里面聊天框很烦，除了打广告，匹配的都是不同段位的高手，你输了会被嘲讽，辱骂，破坏心情。
总体来说不建议购买，人傻钱多除外。
Pretty good game, if u ask me. Even though I enjoy playing custom rounds more than the regular once since at my lvl the killers are mostly camping. That kinda ruins the game at some times.
游戏不错，但是人类修机速度太快了，屠夫很受伤

致命的なエラーが存在する恐ろしいゲームです。

セーブデータの同期エラーによりそれまで取得したパークなどの進行度が消失します。セーブデータはサーバー上に保管されているため、ローカルでバックアップを取る事も出来ないようです。システムエラーのためプレイヤー側で実施可能な対応策などはありません。遭遇する時は遭遇します。「dbd　データ消失」で検索してみて下さい。

私はPS4版では2000時間以上プレイしていますが、steam版に移行後420時間プレイ時に上記エラーと遭遇。運営側の対応は2600万BP補償のみでした。補償BPの査定は主にプレイ時間を参考にして配布するようです。私はキラーメインでプレイし、ほとんどの試合でバベチリ（取得BP＋100％）を使用していました。そのため、キラー21種類でバベチリ、不死、破滅を装備しプレイ出来る程度はパーク取得できていました。

レベル50までブラッドウェブを進めるのに約160万ＢＰ、キラー21種類でこれだけでも3360万BP必要となり、必要なパークを取得するためには余裕でこれ以上のＢＰを消費します。サバイバーもランク1までアップ可能なだけの必要なティーチャブルパークは取得していたため、2600万BPというのは進行度の半分にも満たない補償でした。（追記：stats・プレイヤー統計で確認したところ、これまでの取得BPは7900万BPでした。）

こちらに落ち度がないにも関わらず、多くの時間を費やしたデータが消失し、半分程度の進行度からの復帰を余儀なくされるのです。しかも、ブラッドウェブを数時間かけてコツコツ回す必要があります。こんな理不尽な話はありません。

このエラーは数年前から放置されており2020年11月現在も存在します。ゲームは面白いですが、弱小運営にエラー修正能力がなく、数々のエラーが放置されたままです。運営が移行してからゲームに参加される事をおすすめします。

At its current state, I can't recommend the game to anyone (Except for those who like suffering).

- The survivor hitboxes are massive. You vault a window and two seconds after that the killer hits you through the window.
- The community is shit. Almost as toxic as League of Legends.
- The devs don't fix issues, only push out new dlcs for their wanna-be EA company.
- No voice chat of any sort. Only crappy pre-game text chat.
- The ranking system is complete shit. Imagine a new player just starting the game and them going against a person with 2000+ hours... Not fun.
- The grind for new players is ridiculous. Almost Warframe level of grind.
- The game balance is total shit. Some killers are overpowered while some are useless, same goes for survivor perks. Some are useful, some are total garbage.

PS. I'm sure that some of the current players ("veterans") don't agree with my comments about the game, but that's just how I feel about it while I play.

PPS. Even tho I don't recommend this game etc. I will keep playing it with my friends.

Despite this game's abysmal "skill based" matchmaking system. This game is a blast.

Killer is super fun, it's like playing spy in tf2 but no one is allowed to shoot you. Though people will relentlessly bully you and I'm sure if you have my luck you'll be playing against people with 1000x your playtime. But that's fine. Take your lumps and move on!

Survivor is a gamble but it's a blast with friends. Good mix of stealth and a little bit of true horror when you goof up! Be nice and have fun is the best way to play in my opinion.

Cuando compre a jugar dbd no estaba tan seguro, la verdad es un muy buen juego si lo juegas con amigos, te da muchas horas de diversion aunque con las horas puede ser algo repetivivo, si tienes la oportunidad de comprarlo hazlo sin pensar, creeme que no te arrepentiras.

Si se tiene que decir algo de DBD  es que es un juego muy llamativo ya que mezcla el terror con el supenso ademas de los personajes mas iconicos que ya se han visto, aquellos personajes que en algun momento de tu vida te asustaron y te hicieron tener las mejores pesadillas.
Si tuviera que decir algo de este juego es que sin duda debes jugarlo porque te divertiras y te traera todos los recuerdo que alguna vez tuviste.

I've been playing this game for a long time, but have held off on a review for a while, not because I didn't want to recommend it, but because I struggled to be able to honestly recommend it.

Don't get me wrong, the game still isn't perfect, but from launch to now, it's honestly the best it's been in terms of balancing and bugs (in my opinion anyway.)

Anyway, let me get into a little overview:

Pros:
- Overall fun gameplay
- Fun to play with friends or alone
- The game is still being patched and receiving tons of support, and the devs don't show any sign of stopping soon!
- In game ways to unlock (non-licensed) characters, so you don't have to spend any extra money to get all the extra content (for the most part).
- The game is extremely full of interesting lore

Cons:
- Initially starting, survivors will think killer is overpowered, and killers will think survivor is overpowered. The learning curve is huge, and the "ranking system" still doesn't work, so newer players may struggle at first.
- The community can be very toxic if you don't play exactly how they think you should.
- BUGS (there are always some, but as of right now, the biggest one that I've dealt with is parties breaking every now and again in survive with friends.)
- Extremely grindy at the beginning until you unlock every available characters teachable perks. This will take time and patience. 

Overall, I love this game. By no means is it perfect, and there are plenty of days that it pisses me off. Even still, I come back to it day in and day out, and I personally have no plans of stopping anytime soon. The game is addicting, even in its worst of patches.
Toxic Community, Shit Teammates... What else could I ask for?!

This is a really fun game of hide and seek but mature version! The lore is pretty cute where everyone is stuck in this loop of horror to entertain 'The Entity.'

Killers have different special powers and they try to chase and kill the survivor team. Their goal is to whack the survivors and sacrifice them to the entity by placing them on meat hooks. You can play as a nasty vomit lady to your energetic angsty teen trying to stab people.

The survivors cannot fight back. Survivors can only palette slam the killers with randomized palettes on the map  to momentarily stun the killer & click clack their flashlight to temporarily blind the killers. The longer the chase- the more time you get for your team to complete hit boxes to escape! Fun to play with the right people. Like with any online game, there are toxic players but there are plenty of friendly people in the community.

This game can be difficult if you are hard to hear, or color blind as this game relies on sound to alert you when the killer is nearby or if the survivor's clothing sticks out.

[b]Dead by Daylight is pretty much impossible to recommend in it's current state. [/b]

This game has such a fun premise and so much potential to be great, despite the mediocre 'tony hawk pro skater' tier graphics and the overall simplicity, but it just falls short in so many ways. The biggest issue is matchmaking. I'm not sure how on my first day playing the game I was getting matched with level 5+ Survivors and Level 1 killers, but that happened several times. As I ranked up more it got a little better, but it's still so sporadic and random. There can't be any kind of level cap because I've been literally matched with a level 1 as a level 20.

More irritating is that there appears to be no server region system. It's always a coin flip if you're going to be playing a functional game with players in the same area or get stuck with continuous lagfest with some dude across the world, essentially warping you right back into the killer's arms every 10 seconds when you try and run from them. For a game that is completely centered around a Ranked, competitive online experience, Matchmaking should be their highest priority. I've never played a game with worse matchmaking servers than this. I've never had any issue playing games online before, but this game seems to disconnect me constantly and best of all, you get penalized with a time delay every time the game disconnects you. It always seems to disconnect me when I am winning, yet the penalty for disconnect keeps rising when it should be obvious I am not disconnecting by choice. This is such a ridiculous system.

The Game is labeled as 'asymmetric' but as a lover of asymmetric puzzles, this game just feels unbalanced most of the time. Some Killers, Survivors and Perks are just inherently better than others and there's really nothing more to it. The balance between Killer and Survivor is so far off it's not even funny, to the point where it either feels like you had no chance at winning because everything is stacked against you, or the match is so easy you feel underwhelmed and like you didn't earn a victory at all. Whether you win or lose, you're just left feeling unsatisfied.   

And icing on the cake is that the game is filled to the brim with absurd amounts of paid DLC, so much that if you wanted to have all the characters you'd have to pay well over $120 in DLC alone, not to mention cosmetics and other microtransactions. The Devs ask Triple A pricing and constant pay walls for a game that utimately feels like it's still in pre-alpha.

Not recommended UNLESS it is on sale AND you have friends to play custom matches with, because the matchmaking is so wildly inconsistent. 25% of the time you have the time of your lives and laugh with your friends and encounter great players, and the other 75% of the time it's just such a dumpster fire of bugs, crashes, imbalanced gameplay and exploitative players who body block or camp/farm for points instead of playing the game.
